pr_title: Set compiler encoding to UTF-8 in the generated build.gradle

timeline.message: Set compiler encoding to UTF-8 in the generated build.gradle

timeline.bodyText: I see you added something for Scala. We don't need something for Kotlin?
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText:
According to https://stackoverflow.com/questions/45564450/how-to-set-kotlin-source-encoding-in-gradle:

Kotlin source files are always UTF-8 by design. There is no way to specify any other encoding.
replies.author: gastaldi
